name: New Tab Organizer
description: A customizable startpage with your bookmarks and notes.

name: Battery Percentage Versie
description: Displays the battery percentage in digital form on the toolbar or its own floating window, and sends smart notifications.

name: Very Practical Clock
description: A customizable digital clock that always stays on top.

name: Google AI Studio - File Reader
description: Converts Google AI Studio Files into easy-to-read text files.

name: NotebookLM Source Uploader
description: Automates adding multiple website or YouTube links to Google NotebookLM.

name: YouTube Playlist Collector
description: Collects video links from the current YouTube playlist tab and exports them to a downloadable CSV file.

name: Youtube Rightclick
description: Easily add YouTube video URLs to a CSV list via right-click or toolbar button. Quick capture for content curators & researchers.

name: Link-in-bio-Hub
description: An automated mobile-first web app for centralizing social media links, built with Firebase.

name: YouTube Playlist 2-Way Collector
description: Bi-directional sync tool: Collects YouTube videos into Google Sheets, allows re-ordering in Sheets, and syncs changes back to YouTube.

name: YouTube Playlist Collector
description: Automated data pipeline that extracts video links from all your playlists into Google Sheets via the official YouTube API.

name: URL-pulse
description: A URL monitoring tool automated with GitHub Actions that checks status codes and generates uptime reports.

name: Multi File Rename
description: Batch processing script for Google Drive. Automates the renaming of multiple files at once, including prefix removal and sequential numbering.

name: DocLog One
description: Google Workspace Add-on for Gmail that automatically logs email attachment metadata and links directly into a central Google Sheet.

name: OCR combi
description: Google Workspace Add-on streamlining OCR text recognition and document merging workflows within Google Drive.

name: Linux Partitie Analyser
description: Automated analysis tool for Crostini Linux environments. Audits installed packages and node_modules, using Gemini API to generate intelligent maintenance insights.

name: Account Migration
description: Scalable migration tool designed to transfer full directory structures and files between Google Drive accounts while preserving hierarchy.

name: Custom Data Tree
description: A customizable data visualization tool for structured information trees.

name: Gmail-to-Markdown
description: Gmail Add-on that batch-converts labeled emails into a single, structured Markdown file and saves it to Google Drive.

name: Gmail-to-Sheets
description: Gmail Add-on for exporting key email metadata (sender, date, subject, body) from labeled threads into Google Sheets for analysis.

name: Google Drive Add-ons
description: Collection of productivity scripts including Map Info Viewer and Footnote Remover.

name: Longevity Food Health data tree
description: A structured knowledge graph and data tree focused on Longevity, Health & Food science.

name: Kanban Pro
description: Full-stack architectural showcase. A Kanban board built with Java (Spring Boot), React (TypeScript), PostgreSQL, and Docker.

name: Vegan BioTech Report
description: Automated newsletter and long-read aggregator. Uses AI agents to collect, summarize, and publish data via GitHub Actions.

name: AutiWiki
description: A comprehensive wiki and resource hub focused on Autism spectrum information.

name: Longevity & Health Optimization
description: A health optimization platform powered by Manus.im, refined with Gemini 3.0 and Jules 2.0.

name: Portfolio Vite
description: My personal portfolio website built with React and Vite. (This site).

name: Athena CMS Factory
description: A robust Static Site Generator (SSG) that autonomously builds and deploys portfolio sites using Github Actions.
